body.name: Acer Chromebook Plus 514 Laptop – 14" WUXGA 1920 x 1200 IPS Display | AMD Ryzen 3 7320U | 8GB LPDDR5X | 128GB SSD | Wi-Fi 6E | FHD Facial Auto Exposure Camera | Chrome OS | Steel Gray | CB514-3H-R6G5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EPEAT products are assessed against criteria including energy use and have a reduced sustainability impact across their lifecycle. GOLD

features: More Power, gets More Done: With a 2X faster AMD Ryzen processor and up to double the memory and storage,* edit Google Docs, photos, and videos, while watching your favorite shows in WUXGA on a 1920 x 1200 display. Plus, more power means faster gameplay.**

The Apps You Need to Make Magic: Inspire your inner creator with the built-in Google Photos app on your Chromebook Plus laptop. Get enhanced features like the AI powered Magic Eraser that easily removes unwanted distractions and an HDR effect to enhance brightness and contrast. You can also make high-quality movies with a few easy clicks using new movie creation tools.

Easy to Use, Easy to Love: Fortified with layers of built-in protection, Chromebook laptops are uniquely engineered to keep viruses out and prevent little issues from becoming big headaches – no need to download extra software. Breathe even easier knowing Chromebooks run regular checks to fend off security threats with Sandboxing and Verified Boot.

Access Your Files, Online or Offline: No Wi-Fi? No worries. With double the storage*, File sync on your Chromebook Plus keeps your Google Docs, Sheets and Slides always accessible, whether online or offline***, so you can create wherever inspiration strikes.

Expand Your Chromebook’s Potential: Combining four high performance “Zen 2” CPU cores with cutting-edge AMD Radeon 610M graphics, the AMD Ryzen 3 7320U processor in this Chromebook Plus delivers the fast boot times and responsive performance for modern productivity and collaboration apps that business Chromebook users demand.

Designed To Be Seen: This large-screen Chromebook Plus laptop features 14” WUXGA (1920 X 1200) narrow bezel display with an anti-glare coating that lets users stay productive even in bright conditions.

Crystal Clear Video Calls, Powered by AI: With a 1080p webcam and built-in AI-powered video call tools that automatically enhance clarity and lighting, cancel noise, and blur backgrounds - you’ll always look and sound your best, no matter what app you use. Mute your mic and turn off your camera with one click for added privacy and convenience.

Ports: 2 - USB Type-C ports USB 3.2 Gen 1 (up to 5 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging | 1 - USB 3.2 Gen 1 port | 1 - HDMI 1.4 port with HDCP support | 1 - 3.5mm combo jack (headphone/speaker) | 1 - Kensington Lock Slot

Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) supports dual-stream Wi-Fi in the 2.4GHz, 5GHz and 6GHz bands, including 2x2 MU-MIMO Technology | Bluetooth 5.1 or above | DTS Audio with Two Built-in Upward Firing Stereo Speakers | MIL-STD-810H Military-Grade Durability & Spill Resistant Keyboard (Up to 30ml) | OceanGlass Touchpad | Up to 12 hours of battery life | Chrome OS

Disclaimers: *When compared to top selling Chromebooks from July 2022 to Dec 2022. ** Based on load times and frame rates observed during representative testing of Minecraft and NVIDIA GeForce NOW on Chromebook and Chromebook Plus devices. ***You must be connected to the internet to set up this feature. Download required. Must have available storage space in Google Drive.
body.description: A Chromebook Designed for Your Dynamic Lifestyle: Empower your productivity with the Acer Chromebook Plus 514 thanks to its AMD Ryzen 3 7320U Processor and spacious 14” WUXGA (1920 x 1200) display. An impressive Full HD Facial Auto Exposure Camera, fast wireless connectivity and long-lasting battery life let you transition smoothly between work, home, and personal projects —all day long. And with up to double the speed, memory and storage – plus popular apps – you have the power to do more. (NX.KP2AA.001)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Expand Your Chromebook’s Potential Combining four high performance “Zen 2” CPU cores with cutting-edge AMD Radeon 610M graphics, the AMD Ryzen 3 7320C processor in this Chromebook Plus delivers the fast boot times and responsive performance for modern productivity and collaboration apps that business Chromebook users demand.

More Power, So You Can Do More Do more with Chromebook Plus. Double the speed. Double the memory. Double the storage. Plus, AI-powered Google and Adobe features to do more of what you love. Crystal Clear Video Calls, Powered by AI With a 1080p webcam and built-in AI-powered video call tools that automatically enhance clarity and lighting, cancel noise, and blur backgrounds - you’ll always look and sound your best, no matter what app you use. Mute your mic and turn off your camera with one click for added privacy and convenience. The Apps You Need to Make Magic Inspire your inner creator with the built-in Google Photos app on your Chromebook Plus. Get enhanced features like the AI powered Magic Eraser that easily removes unwanted distractions and an HDR effect to enhance brightness and contrast. You can also make high-quality movies with a few easy clicks using new movie creation tools. Access Your Files, Online or Offline No Wi-Fi? No worries. With double the storage, File sync on your Chromebook Plus keeps your Google Docs, Sheets and Slides always accessible, whether online or offline, so you can create wherever inspiration strikes. Never Had A Virus How good is Chromebook security? Try never-had-a-virus good. Layers of built-in protection help keep viruses out and prevent little issues from becoming big headaches.

Designed To Be Seen This large-screen Chromebook Plus features 14” WUXGA (1920 X 1200) narrow bezel display with an anti-glare coating that lets users stay productive even in bright conditions. All Day Energy, All Day Doing DTS Audio and a fast-charging battery with 12 hours of battery life make this 14-inch Chromebook Plus perfect for on-the-go entertainment. Take it just about anywhere without needing its adapter while you the enjoy high-quality audio from the two upward-facing speakers. Complete Connectivity Boost your productivity with features such as a Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.1, a built-in HDMI port, a USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-A port and dual USB 3.2 Gen1 Type-C ports. Stylishly Rugged Worry less about your device and focus on your work. This Chromebook Plus is independently verified to meet MIL-STD military-grade durability certification. Designed for Sustainability Featuring recycled materials, sustainable packaging, an energy-efficient design, this Chromebook Plus embodies the spirit of our Earthion initiative to reduce waste across the lifetime of the device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better then expected
reviews.reviewText: This will be my 4th Chromebook so I’m no stranger to their limitations as far as an OS goes. This item came packed very well from the factory. The Chromebook itself is very sturdy, great build quality. Good speakers and like all Chromebooks, easy to set up with your google account. I did my research and decided that google plus is the way to go. More memory, faster processor and decent resolution. 14” screen is perfect for my needs. I hope to get many years use out of the Chromebook. Great for young students and internet browsing with some added features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife who needs a laptop mostly for ZOOM meetings. It is super fast and easy to use. All in all, a great computer. I may be a Chromebook customer the next time I buy a laptop.
